title: Roundtop Sans
content:
Roundtop Sans in a newspaper today.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070455im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UnknownRoundtopInTodaysNewspaper_5986.jpg)
  
B is rounded, top and bottom, like R. D, F and L are not rounded on lhs. W is flipped M. C has terminals like S. G has crossbar on inside and vertical spur. K arm and leg are straight lines that meet at lhs vertical stroke. Myfonts and identifont find a number of similars, but no match. Any ideas? Thanks.  
Don

Font: 

 Carbon 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317070455/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
